title: Chris McMillan on Finally Launching His Hair Brand, 30+ Years Into His Career
description: In our long-running series, "How I'm Making It," we talk to people making a living in the fashion and beauty industries about how they broke in and found success. Chris McMillan has been driving global hair trends since he created Jennifer Aniston's iconic "The Rachel" cut in the early '90s, but ...Continue reading
author: Steph Saltzman
